QuestData.Title: Question the Slaves
QuestData.Description: According to the orders you found, there is a key inside the tent in the southeastern end of Deathwing's Fall.$B$BObtain it and free the slaves in the quarry to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Twilight Slaver's Key and free 6 Enslaved Miners.
QuestData.RewardText: Let us find this journal. We're getting close to the World Pillar fragment, I can sense it.
